data.fullContent: Scareware, as it turns out, is not that scary. It includes rogue security software and tech support scams. You might receive a pop-up message claiming that malware was discovered and the only way to get rid of it is to pay up. If you do nothing, you'll likely continue to be bombarded with pop-ups, but your files are essentially safe.
data.answer: 事实证明，恐吓软件并没有那么可怕。它包括流氓安全软件和技术支持诈骗。你可能会收到一个弹出的消息，声称恶意软件被发现了，摆脱它的唯一方法是付钱。如果您什么也不做，您可能会继续受到弹出窗口的轰炸，但您的文件基本上是安全的。
